name: Wild Animal Sniper 2016 - Jungle Hunting Safari
name_original: Wild Animal Sniper 2016 - Jungle Hunting Safari
description:
The deep dark jungles are the deadliest regions to venture into, let alone arrive in as the unwelcomed animal hunter. The depths of the jungle are the most threatening places to be in. For a sniper hunter, these are lethal. Contending against the wild beasts of the nature, you are either an aggressive predator, or an unsuspecting prey!

Grab your sniper rifle and feel what it is like to be part of the true to life hunting grounds in the Jungle Sniper Hunting 3D. Engage in death defying hunts in volatile jungles, filled with aggressive and wild beasts hungry for some fresh meat. If you have the eye of the true hunter, only then you can anticipate attacks from every corner and take the shots to score hunt points, on route to becoming the best sniper shooter in the region.

FEATURES

Engaging sniper hunting experience in realistic deep dark jungles

Superior sniper shooting controls optimized for mobile and tablet devices

Play in contracts to hunt real world animals like:
::: LION :::
::: TIGER :::
::: CHEETAH ::::
::: ZEBRA :::
::: ELEPHANT :::
::: DEER :::
::: FOX :::
::: WOLF :::

Complete hunts to build your repute as a professional grade sniper by earning reward points
